name: ensue-memory-network
description: Persistent memory layer for AI agents via Ensue Memory Network. Store, search, and share memories with semantic vector search capabilities.

plugins.name: ensue-memory
plugins.description: Persistent memory layer for AI agents. Store, recall, search, and share memories with semantic search. Triggers on 'remember', 'recall', 'search memories', 'update memory', 'share', 'subscribe', 'permissions'.
